definition: A TikTok slang term used to express surprise or excitement at someone’s body.
Slang for charisma or flirt game — often used to mean 'pulling' someone.
Used to refer to a lone-wolf masculine mindset. Popular in TikTok edits.
To perform exceptionally well or look amazing. Often used in Gen Z slang.
Non-playable character — used to describe someone acting robotic or fake.
